H0.text: In the water were the organisms that first appeared on Earth.

H1.text: In the air, organisms lived when they first appeared on Earth.

H2.text: On the land, organisms lived when they first appeared on Earth.

H3.text: Under the ground was where organisms lived when they first appeared on Earth.

A4.text: Fossil micro-organisms may have lived in hydrothermal vent precipitates from Quebec, soon after ocean formation during the Hadean

A5.text: life may have originated inside the continental crust or in water at Earth's surface
